attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Look into the time it takes DVLA to process information about SORN & REGISTRATION DOCUMENT changes. The time it takes to issue a registration document is anything up to 6 weeks making it impossible to tax the vehical until received.And having to pay £19 for this very poor service.

rejection.details: You need to re-draft with a proper title for your petition - not your name - and without all the CAPITALS, as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
